sourcesContent:
export const colors = {
  // Light mode palette (original)
  light: {
    primary: '#1E40AF', // Deep royal blue
    primaryDark: '#1E3A8A', // Navy blue
    primaryLight: '#60A5FA', // Bright blue
    primaryGlow: '#93C5FD', // Glowing blue
    accent: '#0891B2', // Cyan blue
    accentAlt: '#7C3AED', // Bold purple
    success: '#059669', // Rich emerald
    warning: '#D97706', // Deep amber
    danger: '#DC2626', // Vibrant red
    background: '#EFF6FF', // Lighter blue background
    darkBg: '#0F172A', // Deep dark blue
    cardBg: '#FFFFFF',
    textPrimary: '#1E293B', // Dark slate blue
    textSecondary: '#64748B', // Slate blue
    gradientStart: '#1E40AF',
    gradientEnd: '#0891B2',
    gradientAlt1: '#7C3AED', // Purple
    gradientAlt2: '#EC4899', // Pink
    neonAccent: '#06B6D4', // Electric cyan for highlights
    glass: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25)' // Glassmorphism effect
  },
  
  // Dark mode palette
  dark: {
    primary: '#3B82F6', // Brighter blue for dark mode
    primaryDark: '#1E3A8A', // Navy blue
    primaryLight: '#60A5FA', // Bright blue
    primaryGlow: '#93C5FD', // Glowing blue
    accent: '#06B6D4', // Brighter cyan for dark mode
    accentAlt: '#8B5CF6', // Brighter purple for dark mode
    success: '#10B981', // Brighter emerald for dark mode
    warning: '#F59E0B', // Brighter amber for dark mode
    danger: '#EF4444', // Brighter red for dark mode
    background: '#0F172A', // Dark blue background
    darkBg: '#020617', // Even darker blue
    cardBg: '#1E293B', // Dark card background
    textPrimary: '#F1F5F9', // Light text
    textSecondary: '#94A3B8', // Medium light text
    gradientStart: '#3B82F6',
    gradientEnd: '#06B6D4',
    gradientAlt1: '#8B5CF6', // Brighter purple
    gradientAlt2: '#EC4899', // Pink stays vibrant
    neonAccent: '#22D3EE', // Brighter cyan highlight
    glass: 'rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.75)' // Dark glassmorphism effect
  }
};
